name: La Zebritta Granittita
Story_EN: La Zebritta Granittita emerged from a flavorstorm. In a small, sunburnt coastal town, an illegal sorbet lab once operated inside an abandoned granita stand. There, amidst spilled syrups, smuggled citrus concentrate, and zebra migration maps torn in half, something extraordinary took form. From frozen pulp and fractured hooves rose Zebrittaâ€”a being of icy poise and slow-stepping sorrow. She opened her eyes and instantly knew she could not stay in one place too long, lest she freeze the world around her.
Story_ID: La Zebritta Granittita muncul dari badai rasa. Di sebuah kota pesisir kecil yang terbakar matahari, sebuah laboratorium sorbet ilegal pernah beroperasi di dalam sebuah kios granita yang ditinggalkan. Di sana, di antara sirup yang tumpah, konsentrat jeruk yang diselundupkan, dan peta migrasi zebra yang sobek menjadi dua, sesuatu yang luar biasa terbentuk. Story_EN: Born beneath the bitter shade of a grapefruit tree struck by lightning during a solar eclipse, Leoparducci Grapefruitucciwas destined for greatnessâ€”or chaos. As a cub, Leoparducci led daring ambushes against the Mango Mambas and Pineapple Pythons, his pelt glowing with citrus oils, his claws sharp as rind. He whispered, There must be more than pulp and pain. And so he vanished.

name: Pot hotspot
Story_EN: It is a combination of skeleton, smartphone and Wi-Fi. Originally derived from Italian brainrot, it is often used as part of a meme called Hotspot Memes. It is characterized by the word Hotspot Bro, and the hotspot meme has a variety of characters that have a concept of hot spots similar to the pod hot spots. The basic concept of the meme is a way of expressing the appearance of whining and gloomy when it is not available to use the hotspot by relying on the hotspot of others. As an aside, the original Indonesian description is very detailed, but as you can see, you don't want to pay for the data. In general, it seems to have satirized the facts that use other people's cellular data, such as begging for hot spots to use only messenger apps for others, and connecting hotspots. In particular, the hotspot is large and downloads the origin that eats the data .
Story_ID: Ini adalah gabungan dari kerangka, smartphone, dan Wi-Fi. Asalnya berasal dari istilah bahasa Italia "brainrot", dan sering digunakan sebagai bagian dari meme yang disebut Hotspot Memes. Ciri khasnya adalah kata "Hotspot Bro", dan meme hotspot memiliki berbagai karakter dengan konsep hotspot yang mirip dengan hotspot pod. Konsep dasar meme ini adalah cara mengekspresikan keluhan dan kesuraman saat tidak bisa menggunakan hotspot sendiri dan harus mengandalkan hotspot orang lain. Sebagai catatan, deskripsi asli dalam bahasa Indonesia sangat detail, tapi seperti yang kamu lihat, orang tidak mau membayar data. Secara umum, meme ini menyindir fakta penggunaan data seluler orang lain, seperti meminta hotspot hanya untuk menggunakan aplikasi messenger, dan menyambungkan hotspot. Terutama hotspot besar yang mengunduh konten berat yang menghabiskan data.
